about_the_game:
Welcome to HOT WORLDS, the biggest Interdimensional Anything-Goes fighting tournament in the universe!

When bored athlete Valentina Rubio discovers a mysterious portal to another dimension, her world is turn upside down as she gets caught up in a fierce competition to rise through the ranks of a mysterious tournament and win the Interdimensional Superhot Champion Belt. But to get there, she'll need to jump through portals to travel through each dimension and defeat the local title holders. Only then can she win the right to challenge the number-one champion to a title fight.

But there's something weird going on with HOT WORLDS. Who even started it? Where are all these portals coming from? Why does everyone seem to have super powers? You'll just have to fight to find out!

  • Deep, fast-paced combat

  • Nine playable characters

  • Fully customizable movesets

  • High-res hand drawn pixel art

  • Co-op and team-based PVP

  • Three game modes

Adventure: Action RPG

  • Follow Val's journey as she travels across dimensions fighting to become the champion of HOT WORLDS

  • Compete in local tournaments to build clout, and explore the universe along the way

  • Learn new moves to pick your own fighting style

  • Make friends with bosses and form a tag-team to compliment each other's weaknesses

  • Challenge other contestants to street fights to raise your rank and challenge local champions to title fights

  • Lose all your hard-earned money at the casino!

Arcade: Run-based action rougelike

  • Pick one of nine playable characters and fight through a series of random enemies

  • Equip powerups and powerful aura moves along the way to get an edge in battle

  • Four difficulty levels for each character, enemies are smarter and have more powerful moves as you progress

Arena: Versus and training mode

  • Fight your friends or against the computer in 1v1, 2v2, and four-player free-for-all matches

  • Single battle, Double battle, or tag-team modes

  • Practice with your custom movesets in training mode
